TITLE: DualSoft
content.betting_info: Nudimo kompletno softversko rešenje za online klad]enje. Nasa ponuda sadrži nekoliko stotina sportskih događaja dnevno i omogucava ljubiteljima sporta da donesu pravi izbor.
content.mobile: Mobilno klađenje -  Web stranice i aplikacije
content.mobile_info: Razvili smo jedinstveni sistem proizvoda zasnovanih na iskustvima korisnika. Naša rešenja za mobilne aplikacije otvaraju korisnicima mogucnost klađenja bilo kad, bilo gde i na bilo koji meč.
content.ssl_partner_info_1: DigiCert is a U.S.-based Certificate Authority located in Lehi, Utah, and has provided SSL Certificates and SSL management tools for over a decade. While other CAs offer a variety of products unrelated to encryption, DigiCert is solely focused on SSL innovation, which is paired with unmatched customer service.
content.ssl_partner_info_2: DigiCert provides a full line of SSL Certificates, tools, and platforms for optimal certificate management. We are industry leaders and work with manufacturers, government entities, educational facilities, and healthcare providers to provide secured communication.
content.oracle_partner_info: With more than 420,000 customers and deployments in more than 145 countries, Oracle offers a comprehensive and fully integrated stack of cloud applications, platform services, and engineered systems.
content.info: Dualsoft je kompanija koja se bavi razvojem i integracijom softverskih sistema. Za više od 10 godina postojanja specijalizovali smo se za informatičke sisteme sportskih kladionica i ostalih organizatora igara na sreću. Koristeći znanje i iskustvo u poznavanju tehnologije uspeli smo da odgovorimo na sve potrebe naših klijenata u kreiranju specifičnih rešenja prilagođenim njihovim zahtevima.
minimal.betting_info: We offer complete solution for online betting.
minimal.mobile_info: Our desktop and mobile solutions let players bet anytime, anywhere, and on any match.
